name: StudyWithJohn
description: Professional online course platform template designed for ASWB exam preparation and educational services. Features a stunning Vanta.js animated hero section with glassmorphism effects, comprehensive course sales pages with pricing tiers, student testimonials, and an integrated dashboard for course management. Perfect for educators, coaches, and online course creators looking to build a modern, conversion-optimized learning platform.
features: Fully responsive mobile-first design with optimized layouts for all devices
Vanta.js FOG animated 3D background with custom blue color scheme
Glassmorphism UI design with backdrop blur effects on navigation and hero section
Sticky hero section with parallax scroll effect on desktop
YouTube video integration with autoplay capabilities
Multi-page architecture with dedicated sales, FAQ, success stories, and dashboard pages
Authentication system with NextAuth integration and login page
Stripe payment integration for course checkout with multiple payment options
Student dashboard with progress tracking, statistics, and achievement badges
Course curriculum display with module breakdown and lesson tracking
Testimonial cards with star ratings, pass results, and student credentials
Lead magnet section with email capture form for free resources
FAQ page with searchable accordion interface and category filtering
Pricing cards with feature comparison and payment plan options
Custom typography system using Poppins, Open Sans, and Sora fonts from Google Fonts
